#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked

inline long in() {
	char c=gc();
	while(c<'0' || c>'9')
		c=gc();
	long num=0;
	while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
		num=10*num+c-48;
		c=gc();
	}
	return num;
}

main() {
	long T,i,j,n;
	T=in();
	while(T--) {
		n=in();
		long a[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;++i)
			a[i]=in();
		long max=a[n-1]-a[0];
		for(i=0;i<n;++i) {
			for(j=i+1;j<n;++j) {
				if((a[j]-a[i])>max) {
					max=a[j]-a[i];
				}
			}
		}
		printf("%ld\n",max);
	}
}
